name: Body Counter
description:
Body Counter is a mathematics-based FPS developed for Ludum Dare 41 (the theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". 

Use the addGun, subtractGun, divideGun or multiplyGun to shoot numbered enemies until your current number is equal to the target number.  You only have 45 seconds per round - how many rounds can you last?!

P.S - The divideGun is dangerous.  If you end up with a decimal number, just shoot the floor to round it down to an integer.

Controls:

WASD + Space to move and jump

Left Mouse Button to fire

Scroll Wheel or 1,2,3,4 keys to swap guns.

(Also, sorry for no web player.  The WebGL build kept bugging out when I uploaded it and I'm too tired to fix it)
